00042 //lint -e970 -e971               ignore MISRA rules 13 and 14 in this function
00043 char const Q_ROM * Q_ROM_VAR QEP::getVersion(void) {
00044     static char const Q_ROM Q_ROM_VAR version[] = {
00045         ((QP_VERSION >> 12) & 0xF) + '0',
00046         '.',
00047         ((QP_VERSION >>  8) & 0xF) + '0',
00048         '.',
00049         ((QP_VERSION >>  4) & 0xF) + '0',
00050         (QP_VERSION         & 0xF) + '0',
00051         '\0'
00052     };
00053     return version;
00054 }
